article_title: Nova Scotia extends coronavirus state of emergency, announces new support funds - Global News

article_content: Nova Scotia has announced a pair of funds that are meant to help workers and small businesses in the province Premier Stephen McNeil announced the two  20 million funds during a provincial update on Thursday The first is known as the Worker Emergency Brid   3597 chars
